glsa.title: libTIFF: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: The libTIFF library is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: libTIFF provides support for reading and manipulating TIFF (Tag Image File Format) images.

description.p: Tavis Ormandy of the Gentoo Linux Security Audit Team discovered a stack based buffer overflow in the libTIFF library when reading a TIFF image with a malformed BitsPerSample tag.

impact.p: Successful exploitation would require the victim to open a specially crafted TIFF image, resulting in the execution of arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
